name: gratingly
content:

in a way that is unpleasant and annoying: Each of them has a gratingly loud voice. His character in the film is gratingly unfunny. Related word
grating adjectiveSynonym
irritatingly
More examplesFewer examplesTheir voices are gratingly harsh."Indeed I am," she said gratingly.Nevertheless, he remains gratingly cheerful.She is gratingly unapologetic about being so condescending.She was one of those gratingly defensive types whose talents did not include humility or a sense of humour.The show was far from subtle, and in parts was gratingly coarse.Their views seemed gratingly old-fashioned.
